Chile and Ecuador have had a streak of not scoring in the last 4 matches in a row, with both teams not having a BBTS (both teams to score) in those matches.
The last 4 matches between Chile and Ecuador have had a sum of goals under 2.5, and the last 2 matches have had a sum of goals under 1.5.
